pages.text:
The $(item)Sanvocalia$(0) is a flower especially attuned to corporetic frequencies. When this flower has $(item)Mana$(0) available and is near a $(item)Corporea Index$(0), it will whisper the requests written on nearby $(item)Corporea Tickets$(0) to the $(item)Index$(0).

Tickets can be created with a $(item)Corporea Solidifier$(0) or a $(item)Ticker Conjurer$(0).
